issue.title: [Python] Store RangeIndex in Parquet files as metadata rather than a physical data column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4094](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4094). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This storage is wasteful in a lot of cases; we can define metadata for the RangeIndex and store it in the "pandas" metadata field
